Package org.ginsim.core.graph.objectassociation

Class ObjectAssociationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.core.graph.objectassociation.ObjectAssociationManager
  • public class ObjectAssociationManager
extends Object
    The association manager can be used as proxy to retrieve or create associated objects. It loads all known specific managers and maintains the list of objects associated to all graphs.
    Author:
    Lionel Spinelli, Aurelien Naldi

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ObjectAssociationManager getInstance()

      • fireUserUpdate

        public void fireUserUpdate​(Graph<?,​?> graph,
                           String prefix,
                           String oldKey,
                           String newKey)
        Signal that a data user has been updated (removed or renamed)
        Parameters:
        graph - graph to which the user was associated
        prefix - prefix to add before the IDs, can be null
        oldKey - old ID under which the user was known
        newKey - new ID, or null if it was removed

      • fireUserUpdate

        public void fireUserUpdate​(Graph<?,​?> graph,
                           String oldKey,
                           String newKey)
        Signal that a data user has been updated (removed or renamed)
        Parameters:
        graph - graph to which the user was associated
        oldKey - old ID under which the user was known
        newKey - new ID, or null if it was removed

      • getObjectManagerList

        public List<GraphAssociatedObjectManager> getObjectManagerList()
        Give access to the list of registered object managers that are not associated with a graph class
        Returns:
        the list of registered object managers

      • getManagedClasses

        public Collection<Map.Entry<Class,​List<GraphAssociatedObjectManager>>> getManagedClasses()
        Give access to the list of classes for which object managers are registered
        Returns:
        the set of class associated to specialised object managers

      • getObjectManagerList

        public List<GraphAssociatedObjectManager> getObjectManagerList​(Class graph_class)

        Returns:
        the list of registered object managers

      • getObjectManager

        public GraphAssociatedObjectManager getObjectManager​(String key)
        Give access to the Object manager in charge of the given object
        Returns:
        the Object manager in charge of the given object, null if no Manager is defined for this object

      • getObjectManager

        public GraphAssociatedObjectManager getObjectManager​(Class graph_class,
                                                     String key)
        Give access to the Object manager in charge of the given object
        Returns:
        the Object manager in charge of the given object, null if no Manager is defined for this object

      • getObject

        public Object getObject​(Graph graph,
                        String key,
                        boolean create)
        Allow to associate objects with a graph to retrieve them later. this (and addObject(key, obj)) makes it easy.
        Parameters:
        key -
        create - if true, a non-defined object will be created
        Returns:
        the associated object
        See Also:
        addObject(Graph, String, Object)
